exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="battleItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="imgBattle" x="0" y="0" source="map_1_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgLock" width="20" height="20" x="29" y="15"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="battleLoadingUISkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="battleLoadingUISkin" width="600" height="349" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="600" height="255" x="0" y="77" fillMode="clip" source="end_B_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgResult" width="404" height="121" x="98" y="0" fillMode="clip" source="end_win_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgQuit" width="78" height="38" x="326" y="242" fillMode="clip" source="botton_leave_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgStart" width="79" height="39" x="163" y="242" fillMode="clip" source="button_again_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="battleToolItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="imgTool" x="0" y="0" fillMode="clip" source="freeze_png"/>
	<e:Label id="lblCount" text="0" x="14" y="26" size="18" width="29" textAlign="center" textColor="0x0c0405"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="battleUISkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="grpBattle"></e:Group>
	
	<e:Group id="grpHeader" width="800" height="98" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image width="184" height="44" x="293" y="5" source="waves_png" fillMode="clip"/>
		<e:Image width="244" height="98" x="0" y="0" source="hero_png" fillMode="clip"/>
		<e:Label id="lblGolds" text="20" x="95" y="12" name="lblGolds" size="20" textAlign="center" width="52"/>
		<e:Label id="lblWaves" text="1" x="363" y="15" name="lblWaves" size="20" textAlign="center" width="26"/>
		<e:Label id="lblTotalWaves" text="1" x="403" y="15" name="lblTotalWaves" size="20" textAlign="center" width="26"/>
		<e:Label text="20" x="95" y="41" name="lblLives" size="20" id="lblLives" textAlign="center" width="52"/>
		<e:Image id="imgBack" width="43" height="46" x="687" y="5" source="back_png" fillMode="clip"/>
		<e:Image id="imgHelp" width="54" height="51" x="746" y="5" fillMode="clip" source="help_png"/>
	</e:Group>
	
	<e:Image id="imgStart" width="210" height="165" x="589" y="314" fillMode="clip" source="start_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>

	<e:Group id="grpSystemTools" width="100" height="76" x="0" y="400">
		<e:layout>
		<e:HorizontalLayout gap="3"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	
	<e:Image id="imgTool" width="80" height="76" x="720" y="400" source="tool_png" fillMode="clip"/>

	<e:Group id="grpTools" width="220" height="46" x="511" y="407" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
		<e:Image width="220" height="28" x="0" y="17" fillMode="clip" source="tool_bg_png"/>
		<e:Group id="grpBoughtTools" width="200" height="46" x="0" y="0">
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout/>
		</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="blockUISkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Rect width="800" height="480" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.01" enabled="true" id="rcBlock"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="buyAchieveUISkin" width="405" height="368" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="407" height="378" x="0" y="0" source="popwinB_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBuyUseGold" width="125" height="75" x="56" y="273" source="buttoncoin_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBuyUseDiamond" y="273" height="75" fillMode="clip" width="125" x="223" source="buttondia_png"/>
	<e:Label id="lblGold" text="0" x="89" y="310" size="24" width="73" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="lblDiamond" size="24" y="310" text="0" x="254" width="75" height="23" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBack" source="helpx_png" x="365" y="-1" fillMode="clip" width="41" height="41"/>
	<e:Image id="imgIcon" width="217" height="132" x="97" y="64" fillMode="clip" source="b1_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgProject" width="115" height="25" x="170" y="203" source="t1_png"/>
	<e:Label id="lblLevel" x="52" y="233" text="000000" size="15" textAlign="right" width="121"/>
	<e:Label id="lblRatio" text="0.00aa" x="324" y="210" size="15" width="45" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="buyAchieveUISkin" width="410" height="370" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="410" height="370" x="0" y="0" fillMode="clip" source="toolpopB_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBuy" y="275" height="78" fillMode="scale" width="129" x="138" source="buttondia_png"/>
	<e:Label id="lblPrice" size="24" y="313" text="0" x="169" width="73" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBack" source="helpx_png" x="369" y="3" fillMode="clip" width="41" height="41"/>
	<e:Image id="imgIcon" width="330" height="180" x="40" y="68" fillMode="clip" source="timeh_png"/>
	<e:Label id="lblGold" text="0.00aa" x="179" y="128" size="24" width="117" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="chargeTipUISkin" width="430" height="730" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="430" height="731" x="0" y="0" fillMode="clip" source="chargeB_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCharge1" width="147" height="58" x="303" y="196" source="topupbutton_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCharge2" width="147" height="58" x="303" y="264" source="topupbutton_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCharge3" width="147" height="58" x="303" y="332" source="topupbutton_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCharge4" width="147" height="58" x="303" y="400" source="topupbutton_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCharge5" width="147" height="58" x="303" y="468" source="topupbutton_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCharge6" width="147" height="58" x="303" y="536" source="topupbutton_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCharge7" width="147" height="58" x="303" y="604" source="topupbutton_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCharge8" width="147" height="58" x="303" y="672" source="topupbutton_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBack" source="helpx_png" x="390" y="0" width="41" fillMode="clip" height="41"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="firstChargeBonusUISkin" width="480" height="610" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="480" height="610" x="0" y="0" source="topup_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Button id="btnCharge" x="239" y="410" width="148" height="58">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="topupbutton_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="btnCancel" y="473" x="239">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="topuplater_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="giftUISkin" width="467" height="608" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="467" height="608" x="0" y="0" source="giftB_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	
	<e:Image id="imgPick1" width="120" height="65" x="315" y="67"  fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgPick2" width="120" height="65" x="315" y="138" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgPick3" width="120" height="65" x="315" y="204" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgPick4" width="120" height="65" x="315" y="270" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgPick5" width="120" height="65" x="315" y="336" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgPick6" width="120" height="65" x="315" y="402" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgPick7" width="120" height="65" x="315" y="465" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png" />
	<e:Image id="imgPick8" width="120" height="65" x="315" y="535" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>
	
	<e:Image x="425" id="imgRet" source="helpx_png" fillMode="clip" y="1" width="41" height="40"/>
	
	<e:Label id="lblOnlineGiftTimeout" text="00:00" x="196" y="146" size="20"/>
	<e:Label id="lblTicketGiftTimeout" size="20" y="288" text="00天" x="158" width="60" height="20"/>
	<e:Label id="lblOutputGift" size="20" y="476" text="00.0aa" x="209"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="guideUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="rcTop" width="480" height="800" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0" enabled="true"/>
	<e:Rect id="rcMiddle" width="480" height="800" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0" enabled="true"/>
	<e:Rect id="rcBottom" width="480" height="800" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0" enabled="true"/>
	<e:Rect id="rcRight" width="480" height="800" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0" enabled="true"/>  
    
	<e:Image id="imgBack" fillMode="clip" source="helpx_png" x="442" y="0" width="41" height="41"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBg" width="472" height="252" x="2" y="546" source="guideB_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgSpeak" width="312" height="130" x="134" y="617" source="G1_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBonus" width="81" height="30" x="332" y="705" source="guidebutton_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgFinger" width="36" height="57" x="89" y="338" fillMode="clip" source="guidearr_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgFocus" width="476" height="172" x="1" y="178" source="highlight1_png" fillMode="clip"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="helpUISkin" width="455" height="655" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="455" height="655" x="0" y="0" source="helppopup_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBack" width="52" height="53" x="401" y="3" source="helpx_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Image id="imgReport" width="149" height="49" x="26" y="81" source="flag_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Scroller width="380" height="460" x="35" y="124">
		<e:viewport>
			<e:Group height="461">
				<e:Label id="lblContent" x="0" y="0" width="380" size="24" text=""/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Label id="lblVersion" text="1.5.2" x="323" y="598" width="95" textAlign="center" size="24"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="worldUISkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="800" height="480" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0x766454"/>
	<e:Scroller height="320" width="800" y="80" x="0">
		<e:viewport>
			<e:Group id="grpMap">
				<e:Image id="imgBg" width="1250" height="320" source="world_jpg" fillMode="clip"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="landingUISkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="800" height="480" x="0" y="0" source="loginb_jpg" fillMode="scale"/>
	<e:Button id="btnLogin" x="315" y="297">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="login_png"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="loginButtonSkin" width="210" height="252" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret-labs.org/wing">
	<e:Group id="icon_group" width="200" height="200" left="0" top="0"/>
	<e:Image id="right_ui" source="right_png" y="146" x="147"/>
	<e:Label id="name_txt" text="标签" textColor="0x070000" width="209" x="1" textAlign="center" height="39" y="219"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="loginRewardUISkin" width="467" height="696" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="467" height="696" x="0" y="0" fillMode="clip" source="7days_png"/>
	
	<e:Image id="imgPick1" width="120" height="65" x="44" y="274"  fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgPick2" width="120" height="65" x="163" y="274" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgPick3" width="120" height="65" x="279" y="274" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>

	<e:Image id="imgPick6" width="120" height="65" x="289" y="451" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgPick7" width="120" height="65" x="54" y="634" fillMode="clip" source="picked_png" />
	
	<e:Image x="389" id="imgRet" source="helpx_png" fillMode="clip" y="126" width="41" height="40"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="loginTypeUISkin" width="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret-labs.org/wing" height="480">
	<e:Group id="btnGroup" width="339" height="63" x="74" y="269">
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" gap="20"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="messageDetailUISkin" width="375" height="380" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="375" height="380" x="0" y="0" fillMode="clip" source="detailB_png"/>
	<e:Image id="imgBack" source="helpx_png" x="331" y="2" fillMode="clip" width="41" height="41"/>
	<e:Image id="imgOperate" width="119" height="48" x="126" y="321" source="del_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Scroller width="300" height="160" x="40" y="71">	
		<e:viewport>
			<e:Group>
				<e:Label id="lblContent" x="0" y="0" width="300" size="24" text=""/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>	
	<e:Image id="imgAttach" width="39" height="34" x="73" y="247" source="dia_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Label id="lblAttach" text="x300" x="122" y="250" size="24"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="messageItemSkin" width="395" height="68" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image height="68" width="395" x="0" y="0" fillMode="clip" id="imgBg" source="bar_png"/>
	<e:Label id="lblDay" text="2014.04.12" x="4" y="6" width="86" size="17" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label id="lblTitle" text="" x="101" y="10" size="20" width="204" height="20"/>
	<e:Label id="lblContent" text="" width="238" size="16" x="9" y="42" height="16"/>
	<e:Image id="imgAttach" width="32" height="32" x="259" y="29" source="coin_png" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Label id="lblAttach" text="x300" x="291" y="37" size="16"/>
	<e:Image id="imgOperate" width="71" height="32" x="323" y="31" source="get_png" fillMode="scale"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="messageUISkin" width="440" height="522" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image x="0" y="0" width="440" height="521" fillMode="clip" source="massageB_png"/>
	<e:Scroller id="scrCompensation" height="352" width="395" x="29" y="137">

			<e:Group id="lstMessage" width="372">
				<e:layout> 
					<e:VerticalLayout verticalAlign="top" gap="0"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image id="imgBack" fillMode="clip" height="41" x="403" y="83" width="41" source="helpx_png"/>    
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="notificationUISkin" width="407" height="380" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">

		<e:viewport>

				<e:Label id="lblContent" x="0" y="0" size="24" text=""/>

		</e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image fillMode="clip" id="imgOk" source="offlineok_png" x="136" y="281" width="137" height="52"/>	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="offlineGoldUISkin" width="400" height="400" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image x="0" y="0" width="400" height="400" source="offlineB_png" fillMode="clip"/>
    
	<e:Label id="lblGold" y="189" text="0" width="176" horizontalCenter="0" textAlign="center"/>

	<e:Label id="lblMinute" y="105" text="0" x="239"/>
    
	<e:Image id="imgOK" width="137" height="52" x="140" y="327" fillMode="clip" source="offlineok_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="optionUISkin" width="570" height="260" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="572" height="259" x="0" y="0" fillMode="clip" source="end_B_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Image id="imgIcon" width="65" height="73" x="63" y="60" fillMode="scale" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="soldiertower4_skill1_png"/>
	<e:Label id="lblContent" text="简单描述" x="162" y="83" width="347" size="24" textAlign="left" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="98"/>
	<e:Image id="imgCancel" width="78" height="40" x="335" y="204" fillMode="clip" anchorOffsetY="0" source="botton_leave_png" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
	<e:Image id="imgOk" fillMode="clip" x="137" y="206" width="79" height="39" anchorOffsetY="0" source="button_again_png" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="rankItemSkin" width="436" height="77" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image height="68" width="68" x="87" y="6" id="imgAvatar" source="Ahide_png"/>
	<e:Image height="77" width="436" x="0" y="0" fillMode="clip" id="imgBg" source="RR_png"/>
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" id="lblRank" x="7" y="22" size="20" width="78" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" height="30"/>
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" id="lblName" x="165" y="9" size="20" width="257" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" height="25"/>
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" id="lblMetal" textAlign="left" width="82" size="20" verticalAlign="middle" x="195" height="20" y="50"/>
	<e:Label fontFamily="微软雅黑" y="50" id="lblGold" textAlign="left" width="86" size="20" verticalAlign="middle" x="330" height="20"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RankUISkin" width="480" height="655" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image x="0" y="0" source="RB_png" width="480" height="655" fillMode="clip"/>
	<e:Scroller id="scrRank" height="320" width="440" x="21" y="30">
		<e:viewport>
			<e:Group id="listRank" width="440">
				<e:layout> 
					<e:VerticalLayout verticalAlign="top" gap="0"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>
